sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Equip: Receiving direct healing from allies has a high chance to restore 3,125 mana to your ally and grant you both 403 Versatility for 10 sec.

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activateLuck of the Draw! causing you to cast Guardian of Ancient Kings for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 10 sec afterLuck of the Draw! activates.
(4) Set: While you have Luck of the Draw! Shield of the Righteous refunds 1-3 Holy Power and extends the duration of Luck of the Draw! by 0.5 sec, up to 10 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Equip: Dealing damage has a high chance to grant you a dose of enomous Potential. At 5 doses, inject them into your target to deal 201,664 Nature damage over 3 sec.

Dealing Nature damage has a chance to grant you an additional dose.

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,401 Strength. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 78,358 Nature damage over 8 sec.

Equip: Your attacks and abilities have a high chance to summon a scarab that retrieves a fortifying chunk of flesh from your target. Scarabs deal 11,764 Physical damage and reduce your damage taken by 50% until 293,996 damage has been prevented.
Use: Send your swarm into a frenzy, summoning 12 scarabs over 3 sec to ravage your foes. The number of scarabs is increased by your Haste. (1 Min Cooldown)
